WEBSITE_JUST_A_SIMPLE_DISCORD_BOT: Just a simple bot for Discord
WEBSITE_INTRO:
Howdy, my name is Loritta (or, to close friends, "Lori") and I'm just a cute bot for Discord with lots of cool features!

While my focus is entertainment (like funny commands and memes) I also do have social features (profile with XP and reputation) and I'm also extremely customizable (you can enable/disable any command, change my prefix to whatever you want and much more!) with a simple focus: Be the best brazilian bot for Discord! (Which doesn't make too much sense right now... since I also speak in English... whatever ü§∑)

One of the reasons that made me become what I'm today was the lack of brazilian bots for Discord, since many brazilian servers in Discord uses bots "of low quality" in portuguese or uses bots that speaks (actually they write) in english... and let's be honest, none of those options seems nice for the users... and that's why I promise to change that!
WEBSITE_DEFAULT_TITLE: Just a simple bot for Discord
HACKBAN_DESCRIPTION: Bans an usar via ID before he joins your server!
HACKBAN_NO_PERM: I don''t have permission to ban this user!
LIMPAR_DESCRIPTION: Clears the chat of the current text channel.
LIMPAR_INVALID_RANGE: I can only clear messages between 2 and 100!
MUTE_DESCRIPTION: Mutes an user for a time period
MUTE_NO_PERM: I don''t have permission to mute this user!
MUTE_SUCCESS_OFF: User `{0}` magically learned how to speak again!
ROLEID_DESCRIPTION: Gets the ID of a role
SOFTBAN_DESCRIPTION: Does a "softban" in an user, that means, the user is banned and then quickly unbanned later, used to delete the messages of an user.
SOFTBAN_FAIL_MORE_THAN_SEVEN_DAYS: It''s impossible to softban someone for more than 7 days!
SOFTBAN_FAIL_LESS_THAN_ZERO_DAYS: It''s impossible to softban someone for less than 0 days! (And how that would''ve work?)
SOFTBAN_NO_PERM: I don''t have permission to softban this user!
AVATAR_DESCRIPTION: Gets the avatar of an user
BOTINFO_DESCRIPTION: Shows interesting (and some very useless) informations about me!
BOTINFO_EMBED_INFO:
Howdy, my name is Loritta (or, to close friends, "Lori") and I''m just a cute bot for Discord with lots of cool features!

I''m in **{0} guilds** and I know **{1} different users** (Wow, so many users)! I was made using **JDA** in **Java & Kotlin** and, if you want to see my source code, [click here](http://bit.ly/lorittagit)!

My website is https://loritta.website/ and, if you want know more about me, [click here](http://bit.ly/lorittad) to join my Discord guild!

I''m awake since **{2}** ago üò¥ (in other words, my current uptime) and I have **{3} different commands**!

AJUDA_INTRODUCE_MYSELF:
Howdy {0}, my name is Loritta (or, for close friends, "Lori") and I''m just a simple bot for Discord!

My objective is to be a bot with general functions, extremely modular, easy to use and super customizable for every server! (Want to add me to your server? Then click [here]({1}))!

Currently you are viewing the help for **{2}**!
ANGEL_DESCRIPTION: Shows an angel too pure for this cruel world :^)
ESCOLHER_DESCRIPTION: Needing some help to choose something? Then let me choose for you!

LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION: Lets you change the language I speak in your guild!
BACKGROUND_DESCRIPTION: Why not spice up your profile with a new fancy wallpaper?
BACKGROUND_INFO:
**Do you want to change your profile''s wallpaper? Then you came to the right place!**

Click in üñº to view your current wallpaper
Click in üõí to view the default templates

Want to send your own wallpaper? No problem! Send a 400x300 image in chat and, with the image, write `{0}background`! (You can also send the image link with the command that I will also accept it!)

(Don''t send NSFW wallpapers! If you send and get caught, your account will be suspended and you won''t be able to use me!)

LORITTA_ADDED_ON_SERVER:
Howdy {0}, how are you? I hope your day is being excellent! ‚úßÔæüÔΩ•: *„ÉΩ(‚óï„ÉÆ‚óï„ÉΩ)

I don''t know if it was you or somebody else that added me in {1}, but, because you have Administrator (or manage server) permission I thought it was a good idea to talk about me. <:loritta:331179879582269451>

My name is Loritta and I''m just a simple bot for Discord! My objective is to make your server more üëåüî•üîù with more entertainment, better administration and with stuff that you *never* seen in other bots!

Well... Enough blabbing about nothing! Let me talk about some stuff that maybe you will like. üòâ

‚Ä¢ By default my prefix is `+`, try using `+ping` in your server to be sure that I''m working!
‚Ä¢ If you want to change/enable/disable my features, then go to my panel! {2}
‚Ä¢ If you need help, if you want to report bugs, if you want to suggest something or if you just want to talk about me, why not visit my apartament? üòä {3}
‚Ä¢ I have a bunch of commands (If you wanna know, I have **{4} different commands**!), if you want to know every single one of them, use *help* in this chat!
‚Ä¢ You can send new YouTube videos of an YouTube channel directly on your server! (Also... did you know that I do notify new videos faster than YouTube itself? üòâ) Just go to my panel and configure that!

...seriously, my panel has everything and a bit more, go check it out! {2}

**Tip from <:loritta:331179879582269451>, the brunette of the neighborhood:** If you have a bit of money laying around, then please donate! <{5}> Did you know it costs 260R$ per month to keep me online? So... do you know that hamburger that is a bit moldy that you always buy... instead of buying that moldy stuff, you could donate to me so I could stay online for more days! üòä

UNPAUSE_UNPAUSED: The music is already playing! If you want to stop playing, use {0}parar
SEEK_TOO_BIG: I want to know how I will change to that position if the music is only `{0}`...
PLAYLIST_DESCRIPTION: Shows all the songs in DJ Loritta's queue!
